creator: Petr.Udalau@exigenservices.com
text:
UDFs can modify cells.
Added possibility to update cells during the evaluation from the FreeRefFunctions.

creator: Petr.Udalau@exigenservices.com
text:
Hi,
What about this patch? There is no response since 2009 year.

The patch looks ok at first glance, but I've absolutely no idea what it's doing or trying to solve...

Could you please provide a bit more info on the problem you're facing, so we can better understand if this patch is an appropriate solution for it?
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: No response for several years, therefore resolving this for now, too less information about the purpose of this patch to successfully apply it.
